To Jackie , I look forward to seeing you again . I made it this far . I appreciate your advice as it guided me through darkest moments . May the odds be in your favor . Happy new year . " - -

We will see many good - or - bad films and discuss everything in those films . And we will do it together . We will keep every our special moment in our albums . But , sadly , i know you will never be mine . So ... I ' m a Korean student . I wonder if this an official IU cfs page or not.ok Leave that behind this is my story . I have trouble ordering food in the canteen - i ' m still on my way to get used to Vietnamese food ( the court near the entrance ) - most of the food here are in VNmese , everytime i order it ' s like i ' m playing Russian Routhlete , i mean , some food are good but some are not my taste - i had once ordered grilled fish mix in sauce or sth , i can even finish it + . + , and took instant noodle instead . It ' s my fav food court tho , it ll be much better if they put some picture of the food on it ( like the green court ) or detail english description . Hu tiu is my fav dish there , it ' s addictive < 3 - -

I just want to be heard . Being the younger child , all my life I have worked my ass off for your recognition . I have been trying , and trying only to show you that your daughter is just as gifted as her elder brother , but has anyone noticed ? Or are you too busy praising your eldest son ? Everything , everything that I ' ve done , I just want your encouragement . But all I ever know is your jokes on how my projects failed , how my dates got postponed , how silly I look in those volunteer works and how I talk about my dreams and ideas . Time after time I got used to your judgement , keeping me second - guessing myself , believing that I was not good enough and never would I be . I was surprised when people told me how smart I was , for I was made to believe I was a foolish girl . But thank you , to some extend , for pushing me to try even harder to prove myself , and I did have some achievements . I just wanted to make you proud , just like he always does . Yes he is always able to pull it off . But can ' t you be proud of me too ? I ' m too tired of being joked on . I don ' t want to keep doubting myself . I don ' t want to waste another moments crying feeling so damn small ... But I cannot . Papa , mama . Can you at least lie to my face and show some encouragement ? - -

I couldnt wait to go to a pet cafe . This one was a little far from where we live but it was totally worth our drive . The place is very clean for having so many animals and their coffee is actually one of the best we have , wasnt too strong or watery . They have quite a few differnt birds you can hold on the first floor along with a few dogs . On the second floor they have cat and a bunnies . Scattered throughout there are hampsters and frogs in cages . I would definitly recomend this place if you like pets and dont have any allergies .

Tonight is the 2nd worst experience at restaurant in Vietnam . Maybe i came here alone so not good customer . Order receipt look like paper were thrown to my table , curry i ordered was left to the table across from me , and by the time somebody realized that curry was mine , rice in claypot was already cold . No word from any of staff . Ordered 2nd beer and ice , i needed to ask for ice twice . Only about 10% of table were filled and should not be busy . I cannot recommend this place to anybody . Of course , i will not come to this place anymore .

Moi nguoi hay can than khi den wuan ChuTeo nay , dac biet la ko nen de nhung vat quy gia nhu mat kinh , bop tien ... o trong cop xe , vi cho de xe o cach xa quan nen ten dan xe ban vao cho de xe , cung voi nhung ten giu xe se cay cop xe ban va an cap . Noi chung phai rat can trong khi den quan nay vi dao duc lam an khong co ... Them vao nua , do nuong tuy kha re nhung minh cam thay chat luong va ve sinh cac mon nuong rat kem va khong gian thi qua te , khoi bay khap nha khi nuong ... Minh chi den 1 lan va rat ngai , de dat khi dan gia dinh hay gioi thieu ban be , dong nghiep den quan nay lan thu hai .

From first glance it looked like a decent " binh dan " place , would definitely say its attractive to those that are looking for a good quality bowl of Pho . Very comfortable in seating choices and a moderately sized pho house . However , upon going in and receiving my bowl of PhoTai I was confused as to why the noodle isn ' t your typical " banh pho " but rather the silver noodles used in HiuTieu style soup . All in all it was still a decent bowl of pho but the HiuTieu noodles was a really strange twist . I wouldn ' t go again , however .

I went by myself and had Thai iced tea , yam woon sen and beef massaman - all very basic Thai dishes . This is 1of 2 locations of a popular local upscale and over - priced fusion Thai place . Offerings are many of the staples of Thai cuisine you would see in any westernised style restaurant - but strangely over sauced , under-seasoned , under-whelming and over - priced as well .

I went here for a quick coffee and to get some work done for an hour . Ordered a VietnameseIceCoffee with Milk ( ca phe sua da ) for 50,000 d . When it arrived , it was not even close to what I believe ca phe sua da to be ( have been in Vietnam on - and-off for the past 6 years ) . It was essentially a shot of Vietnamese coffee , fresh milk , Korean sugar syrup and a hell of a lot of water .
